detail_desc: Woven cotton blouse in a shorter style with a V-neck and concealed fastener at the front, low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs and wide, sewn-on ties at the waist.
Blouse in sheer satin with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and low V-neck with decorative buttons at one side. Long sleeves with gathers and buttons at the cuffs.
Blouse in sheer satin with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and low V-neck with decorative buttons at one side. Long sleeves with gathers and buttons at the cuffs.

Long, padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim, a stand-up collar and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Appliqué on one sleeve and fleece-lined zipped side pockets. Fleece lining.
Long padded jacket with a padded hood, shawl collar and concealed press-studs down the front. Dropped shoulders and welt side pockets. Lined.
Long padded jacket with a padded hood, shawl collar and concealed press-studs down the front. Dropped shoulders and welt side pockets. Lined.
Oversized jumper in a soft, fine cashmere knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shorter padded jacket in imitation patent leather. Padded hood with a tab and press-studs at the front and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, long raglan sleeves and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Short, straight-cut dress in sturdy cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short, frilled sleeves. Unlined.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in sturdy jersey with a denim feel. Wide flounce at the top and a concealed zip in one side.
Short-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey.
Leggings in soft velour with an elasticated waist.
Leggings in soft velour with an elasticated waist.
Fishnet leggings with elastication at the waist and hems.
Leather loafers with tassels, a moccasin seam at the front and soft heels that can be folded down. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.
Leather loafers with tassels, a moccasin seam at the front and soft heels that can be folded down. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.
Glittery ankle boots with a zip in the side and round toes. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 5.5 cm.
Knee-length dress in sturdy cotton jersey with frill-covered shoulder straps and a flounce at the top. Seam at the waist, flared skirt and a concealed zip in the side. Unlined.
Straight-cut top in sturdy cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and ribbing around the neckline.
Straight-cut top in sturdy cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and ribbing around the neckline.
Gently fitted jacket in soft faux fur with a lined hood, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and side pockets. Lined.
Gently fitted jacket in soft faux fur with a lined hood, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and side pockets. Lined.
Tights containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist.
Tights containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist.
Short chiffon dress with an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with a frill at the end, and a seam with smocking at the waist. Lined.
Short chiffon dress with an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with a frill at the end, and a seam with smocking at the waist. Lined.
Leggings containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist.
Short skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and pleated tiers. Lined.
Tights containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist. 40 denier.
Jacket in crushed velvet with a printed jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Long sleeves with a frill down the side and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Pull-on trousers in soft crushed velvet with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with frilled side seams and ribbed hems.
Long T-shirt in slub jersey with a sequined motif on the front and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Long T-shirt in slub jersey with a sequined motif on the front and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Metal double-hoop earrings. Total length 8.5 cm.

Blouse in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon with a small stand-up collar and partially concealed buttoning at the front. Decorative frills front and back, and long sleeves with an opening and button at the cuffs.
Loafers with a grosgrain trim around the top, satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Hat in a soft knit with decorative pompoms.
Shaping briefs in mesh with a high waist, laser-cut edges and a lined gusset. The briefs have a lightly sculpting effect on the waist, seat and hips.
Chokers in various designs. Two in narrow velvet ribbon, one with a sparkly stone pendants. One in thin metal chain. Adjustable length, 29-37 cm and 38-46 cm.
Mesh choker. Adjustable length, 30-37 cm.
Mesh choker. Adjustable length, 30-37 cm.
Wrap dress in patterned satin with a V-neck, narrow tie at the waist and buttoned cuffs.
Short, straight dress in crinkled chiffon with an opening with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck and long sleeves with a double flounce at the cuffs. Lined.
Short, straight dress in crinkled chiffon with an opening with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck and long sleeves with a double flounce at the cuffs. Lined.
Short, straight dress in crinkled chiffon with an opening with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck and long sleeves with a double flounce at the cuffs. Lined.
Calf-length dress in an airy weave with a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and narrow tie. Deep V-neck, seam at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined.
Calf-length dress in an airy weave with a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and narrow tie. Deep V-neck, seam at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined.

Short cotton flannel shirt with a drawstring hood lined in sweatshirt fabric. Press-studs down the front, a drawstring at the hem and flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and half-string back.
Biker boots in imitation leather with a concealed zip in one side and decorative tabs and metal buckles. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3 cm.
Platform hi-tops in satin with imitation leather details, lacing with speed hooks and a padded top edge. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 5.5 cm.
Platform hi-tops in satin with imitation leather details, lacing with speed hooks and a padded top edge. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 5.5 cm.
Ankle boots with round toes and a soft shaft. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Imitation suede trainers with a lightly padded edge and tongue, and lacing with a detachable faux fur decoration at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Imitation suede trainers with a lightly padded edge and tongue, and lacing with a detachable faux fur decoration at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Slip-on fabric trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Slip-on fabric trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Slip-on fabric trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Slip-on fabric trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and contrasting-colour zips in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections and an elasticated waist with a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Cotton corduroy trousers with wide stripes, a regular waist and zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets and slightly shorter straight legs.
Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Front in contrasting chenille yarn.
Short, straight dress in woven fabric with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, beaded embroidery at the shoulders and long, puffed sleeves. Unlined.
Short V-neck dress in lace with a concealed zip at the back, long, straight sleeves and a seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Short V-neck dress in lace with a concealed zip at the back, long, straight sleeves and a seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Top in soft jersey with lace cap sleeves and gathers at the sides for a good fit over the tummy.
Short satin shorts in a viscose blend with an elasticated waist and wide tie belt. Fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt pocket at the back.
Long-sleeved shirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Slightly longer with a rounded hem at the back.
Long-sleeved shirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Slightly longer with a rounded hem at the back.
Long-sleeved shirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Slightly longer with a rounded hem at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim, straight legs.
Shirt in airy pima cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt in airy pima cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a round neck, decorative stitching at the back and short slits in the sides. Ribbed hem, and ribbing and a short slit at the cuffs.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a round neck, decorative stitching at the back and short slits in the sides. Ribbed hem, and ribbing and a short slit at the cuffs.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a ribbed V-neck, long sleeves with narrow, ribbed cuffs and a ribbed hem.
